amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to removing the prohibition on States and territories against lowering their taxes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3114 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 86 - 13. Record Vote Number: 331.

action.text: Amendment SA 3114 proposed by Senator Braun. (consideration: CR S6219-6220; text: CR S6219) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to removing the prohibition on States and territories against lowering their taxes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3114 proposed by Senator Braun.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3114 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 86 - 13. Record Vote Number: 331.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3114 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 86 - 13. Record Vote Number: 331.
